description.narrative: This activity (School Infrastructure Component) is a component of Punjab Education Support Programme II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £45,899,995. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Education facilities and training. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide. The start date is 26-04-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - teacher training
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 1
